page.title: 01Principal Features
page.content: Loughton is split into two parts. The west side is mainly forest and the east is residential. In the{forest}is Loughton Camp where Boudicea is said to have hidden from the Romans. Connaught waters is the largest expanse of water in our area.There are quite a few rides, which are paths through forest to help it breathe. Next comes the{residential}part where there is a Railway station with frequent trains to and from London. There is a Bus station and the Motorway M11 running through the S.E. of our grid.The High road is where the big shopping area is and practically everything is built around it. Because of the large residential part there are many schools, but because of falling roles one of them is going to have to close.
